title: Z-Virus
description: Zombies, an ordinary trucker and a bad ass female assassin! Z-Virus tells a story about apocalyptic future 2030 where unknown virus spread wildly on earth. It started when a group of scientists tested a serum that was infected by the virus on a sick dog, which turned out to be a terrifying nightmare. No one knows what was the caused, the serum was tested years before it was officially launch. Someone behind the curtains was hiding and pulling the strings silently. Travis, one of the few surviving people struggles to put an end to this horrific situation. Accompanied by his loyal dog named Prince, will Travis be able to uncover the secret behind this mysterious plague? Now the hunt begins . . .
author: M.D. Khamil
